thread.title: Great Hotel, Excellent service - Review
thread.title_full: Great Hotel, Excellent service - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Martin M
title: Great Hotel, Excellent service - Review
text: We stayed at the Casablanca for 4 nights in March 17 and have nothing but good words to say about the hotel and the team that look after you during the stay. We got a really nice greeting upon entering the lobby and were quickly invited to use the second floor facilities for tea, coffee and evening wine and cheese .. a really nice touch.. Our room was ready when we arrived and was lovely. The hotel itself is situated in a great place close to Times Square with all of the NYC attractions in easy walking distance. I would recommend this hotel to family and friends and would definitely use again if we return to New York..
